mapper.sql: company_cd, product_power_cd, product_power_name, author_cd, author_name, registered, maintainer_cd, maintainer_name, modified
mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.product_power_mst (company_cd,product_power_cd, product_power_name, author_cd, author_name, registered, maintainer_cd, maintainer_name, modified ) values (#{conpanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPowerCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productPowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{maintainerCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintainerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now() )
mapper.update: update planocycle.product_power_mst set deleteflg=1 , maintainer_name =#{authorName} , maintainer_cd = #{authorCd} , modified=now() where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and product_power_cd = #{productPowerCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update planocycle.product_power_mst set product_power_name=#{productPowerName} ,maintainer_cd=#{maintainerCd}, maintainer_name=#{maintainerName},modified=now() where company_cd=#{conpanyCd} and product_power_cd=#{productPowerCd} and deleteflg=0
mapper.select: select distinct product_power_cd,product_power_name from planocycle.product_power_mst where company_cd = #{conpanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct product_power_cd ,product_power_name ,registered ,author_name from planocycle.product_power_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteflg=0 and author_cd = #{authorCd} order by product_power_cd desc

select count(datas.jan) from planocycle.product_power_mst mst left join planocycle.product_power_mst_data datas on mst.product_power_cd = datas.product_power_cd and mst.company_cd = datas.company_cd where mst.product_power_cd = #{productPowerCd} and mst.company_cd = #{companyCd}

select max (jandataMst.face_count) faceMaxNum,min(jandataMst.face_count) faceMinNum,avg(jandataMst.face_count) faceAvgNum from (select jan,sum(face_count) face_count from planocycle.shelf_pts_data ptsData left join planocycle.shelf_pts_data_jandata jandataMst on ptsData.id = jandataMst.pts_cd where ptsData.shelf_pattern_cd=#{patternCd} group by jan) as jandataMst
select shelf_pattern_cd as shelfPatternCd,shelf_name_cd as shelfNameCd from planocycle.product_power_param_mst where product_power_cd = #{productPowerCd}
